text: læa rea midi xthrrm tx phwk khea tæwa phwk khea xthrrm tx taw khxng phwk khea xeng læa brrda phracea khxng phwk khea thi phwk khea wingwxn khx xun ca kxallxh nan ca mi xanwy prayochn xan dı hı kæ phwk khea ley meux phra baycha khxng phracea khxng than di ma thung læa phracea hela nan midi pheim xan dı kæ phwk khea nxkcak khwam phinas
